Class People

java.lang.Object
People
Direct Known Subclasses:
Member
public class People
extends java.lang.Object
The class People is used to manage club's members and administrators.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    People​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
    Class constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void clearList​(ItemDemo<People,​Activities> param)
    This method is used to delete the item from the list of correspondence between People and Activities when a People (i.e Member or Administrator) delete itself from a course or competition.
    ItemDemo<People,​Activities> delete​(People p, Activities a, java.lang.String act)
    This method is used by a member or administrator to delete itself from a course or competition.
    void deleteFromAllActivities​(People param)
    This method is used to delete a member or administrator from all activities (i.e course or competition) when it is removed from the club.

  • Constructor Details

    • People

      public People​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - It is the name of the member or administrator.
      surname - It is the surname of the member or administrator.
      email - It is the email of the member or administrator.
      password - It is the password of the member or administrator.

  • Method Details

    • clearList

      public static void clearList​(ItemDemo<People,​Activities> param)
      This method is used to delete the item from the list of correspondence between People and Activities when a People (i.e Member or Administrator) delete itself from a course or competition.
      Parameters:
      param - It is the Item to delete from the list of correspondence between People and Activities.

    • deleteFromAllActivities

      public void deleteFromAllActivities​(People param)
      This method is used to delete a member or administrator from all activities (i.e course or competition) when it is removed from the club. This method uses the delete method to unsubscribe people from a course or competition. At the same time it is removed from the correspondence list.
      Parameters:
      param - It is the People to delete from all activities.

    • subscribe

      public int subscribe​(People p, Activities a, java.lang.String act)
      This method is used by a member or administrator to subscribe itself in a course or competition.
      Parameters:
      p - It is Member/Administrator who want subscribe.
      a - It is the activity where people will be subscribed.
      act - It is a string used to indicate the activity (i.e Course or Competition).
      Returns:
      The return is used only to exit from the method.

    • delete

      public ItemDemo<People,​Activities> delete​(People p, Activities a, java.lang.String act)
      This method is used by a member or administrator to delete itself from a course or competition.
      Parameters:
      p - It is Member/Administrator who want unsubscribe.
      a - It is the activity where people will be delete.
      act - It is a string that defines the activity.
      Returns:
      It returns the item deleted.

    • getUpdateId

      public static int getUpdateId()
      This method tracks id values readed from a file called "id.txt" continuously updated. This file is readed and rewrited at each creation of an instance of Member/Administrator. The id uniquely identifies a club member or administrator.
      Returns:
      ID to be assigned to the member/administrator.

      public int getID()
      Method used to return id.
      Returns:
      Id of the instance of the class.
